meanings.definition: The act of representing something in a dramatic manner.
meanings.sent1: The school play was full of exciting dramatizations.
meanings.sent2: The movie was a great dramatization of the historical event.
meanings.sent3: The children's exaggerated dramatizations of their favorite stories made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her retelling of the incident was a vivid dramatization that captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The dramatizations in the play made the audience feel like they were part of the story.

meanings.definition: A dramatic representation or adaptation of a story or event.
meanings.sent1: The dramatizations in the theater production were captivating.
meanings.sent2: The TV show was a modern dramatization of the classic novel.
meanings.sent3: The exaggerated dramatizations of the crime scene made the detective chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His speech was a powerful dramatization of the struggles faced by many.
meanings.sent5: The dramatizations on stage brought the audience to tears with their emotional impact.
